description.value: Code indicating whether or not a provider is participating (accepting assignment) for this line item service on the non-institutional claim. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/prtcptng_ind_cd

display.value: All or some covered and allowed expenses applied to deductible Participating

definition.value: All or some covered and allowed expenses applied to deductible Participating

display.value: Assignment accepted but all or some covered and allowed expenses applied to deductible Non-participating.

definition.value: Assignment accepted but all or some covered and allowed expenses applied to deductible Non-participating.

display.value: Assignment not accepted and all covered and allowed expenses applied to deductible non- participating.

definition.value: Assignment not accepted and all covered and allowed expenses applied to deductible non- participating.
